attributes.action: put an end to councillors/ministers junkets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: put an end to these junkets, as they serve no purpose other than a free holiday,the reason i say this is,my local council advertises the fact that these junkets have been under taken by members of the council(under duress i dont think)on their return we see little or none lessons learned by them

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
